changes.description: Added AttachmentType enum, Attachment interface, and RepliedMessage interface. Updated Message interface to include optional repliedToMessage and attachments fields.

dodCompleted: Attachment interface defined with url, type, metadata fields
RepliedMessage interface defined with id, content, senderType, mediaUrl, sentAt fields
Types match backend DTO structure exactly
All existing Message fields remain unchanged
notes: Successfully extended frontend Message types to include repliedToMessage and attachments. The types are compatible with the backend DTOs. TypeScript type checking passed without errors.
